means: [医][拉]芥属，芸苔属：十字花科植物的一属，包括甘蓝、芥子及其亲缘种。B. alba Rabenh. (Sinapis alba)为白芥，B.nigra Koch为黑芥。这类植物的种子经压榨和湿润后，流出挥发性油。见mustard和oil of must

sentence.Network_en: As one of important oilcrops, rapeseed belongs to the Brassica genus Cruciferae family.
sentence.Network_cn: 油菜是世界上广泛种植的一种油料作物, 它在植物分类上属于十字花科(Cruciferae)芸苔属(Brassica),以收获种籽榨油为主要目的.

sentence.Network_en: The microspore culture technology has been widely applied in Brassica species nowadays.
sentence.Network_cn: 随着芸苔属作物小孢子培养技术的日趋成熟,应用范围也越来越广泛.

sentence.Network_en: Mustard is the ground seed of two species of the Brassica.
sentence.Network_cn: 芥茉是两种芸苔植物的籽研磨品.

entry.def: Brassicas are vegetables such as cabbages, broccoli and turnips.
